name: positive-intentions-chat
tagline: A self-hosted real time messaging application
description: Chat is a self-hosted messaging app with user accounts, channels, and real-time communication using WebSockets. It focuses on privacy and supports theming and file transfers through a modern UI.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create public or private channels for topic-based discussions and team collaboration

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Register and manage user accounts with authentication and profile customization

features.title: File Transfers
features.description: Share files and images directly in conversations with drag-and-drop support

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Personalize the interface with custom themes and color schemes

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Access complete conversation history with search and filtering capabilities

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts for new messages, mentions, and channel activity

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted deployment ensures complete control over conversation data and user privacy
